text: Aur uss cheez ki aarzoo na kero jiss kay baees Allah Taalaa ney tum mein say baaz ko baaz per buzrugi di hai. Mardon kay uss mein say hissa hai jo unhon ney kamaya aur aurton kay liye uss mein say hain jo unhon ney kamaya aur Allah Taalaa say uss ka fazal maango yaqeenan Allah her cheez ka janney wala hai
